name: Intercom - Oauth App Example
description: An example app using Intercom's OAuth

self_ssl.description: Set to 1 only if you want to use your own files for certificates

redirect_url.description: If you have multiple `redirect_url`s specified you can use this to specify which one to use (by default Intercom will use the first one)

PORT.description: The port you wish to host this on
